thread.title: CA promised the security given to Presidents
thread.title_full: CA promised the security given to Presidents

title: CA promised the security given to Presidents
text:
Bangladesh v Australia Test tour: BCB make last ditch effort to quell Cricket Australia’s security concerns AAP Bangladesh v Australia Test tour: BCB make last ditch effort to quell Cricket Australia’s security concerns AAP Bangladesh tour in doubt 0:39 
Cricket: The Bangladesh Cricket Board has made a last ditch effort to ensure Australian players' safety, however the tour still seems unlikely to go ahead October 1st 2015 5 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Cricket/Australian Internationals/ 
AUSTRALIA’S tour of Bangladesh is expected to be called off today following high-level meetings about threats of militant attacks. 
Cricket Australia is expected to announce the two-Test series, slated to start on Saturday with a tour game, has been abandoned in the wake of the threats. 
CA’s security staff briefed the peak body’s board and Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade on Wednesday, having returned from meetings in Bangladesh. Other Stories
